title: OTC phytopharma and homeopathy revenue Germany 2022 | Statista
author: Statista Research Department; Aug
description: This statistic shows the pharmacy revenue for over the counter phytopharmaceuticals and homeopathy in Germany from 2014 to 2022, compared to other over the counter medicine.
cleaned_text: Pharmacy revenue from OTC medicine in Germany 2022 [This statistic shows the pharmacy revenue for over the counter phytopharmaceuticals and homeopathy in Germany from 2014 to 2022, compared to other over the counter medicine.
